item.title: terrascape beans + barley 2023
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Richmond Green Park, Calgary Course: stravalink I missed out on writing this up at the end of the 2023 CX season, and now that 2024 has come around, I don’t have a bunch of the data I like to put in these race writeups. Nonetheless, here’s what I can find (thankfully I did do my CrossResults upload back when the race happened). results CrossResults Podia Expert Men Larix HALLETT Emile VOGEL-NAKAMURA Spencer POOTZ Novice Men Cor SINKE William LEMIEUX Emmet MACKLEM Open Men Eric BERG Ryan MACLEAN Mark FAGNAN Open Women Jenaya FRANCIS Nico KNOLL Francesca SEAL Sport Men Joel DYCK Sean SWEENEY Brendan CARDIFF1 Sport Women Tayte PROULX-ROYDS Hazel ROBERTS Kathryn SWEENEY my results did not race read more Velocity Cycling Club woo!

item.title: bicicross 2023
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Richmond Green Park, Calgary Course: stravalink I missed out on writing this up at the end of the 2023 CX season, and now that 2024 has come around, I don’t have a bunch of the data I like to put in these race writeups.
